inclusion.criterion: complain of localized provoked vulvar pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: meet the criteria for the diagnosis of localized provoked vulvodynia
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The presence of a dermatologic or neurologic condition which is determined by the investigator to be the primary cause of the patient's pain.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to any of the medications or the base itself.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto disease, but it is not mentioned as a cause of pain. No mention of allergy to medications.
